import {BsPlusSquare, BsDashSquare} from 'react-icons/bs' import {AiFillCloseCircle} from 'react-icons/ai' import './index.css' const CartItem = props => { const {cartItemDetails} = props const {idtitle, brand, quantity, price, imageUrl} = cartItemDetails const remove = () => { removeit(id) } return (

  • {title}

    by {brand}

    {quantity}

    Rs {price * quantity}/-

    • ) } export default CartItem
